title: Black Screen Problem
body: I was playing ranked and I got the black screen during my second promo game. Team lost without me, i got past it. However I got 5 games in low priority. I was on the 4th game of low priority when the black screen happened again, in ranked. Now i have 5 more. I am not leaving these games on purpose, i am getting black screened. Fix your game, this isn't my fault. My resolution of the cfg file is the same as my computer as well. I tried everything I could think of. I am going to get banned from this crap eventually or I won't be able to play at all. The black screen is random so  I just cant play the game ever. I wait 20 minutes in low priority q for a black screen and another 5 games of low priority q. This is dumb and I dont deserve these restrictions.

replies.body:
Most of the time those black screens are caused by some kind of weird software or driver interaction. Essentially your pc is having a hard time figuring out how to display League's graphics. My first suggestion is: if you keep getting these black screen errors I would try focusing on fixing this issue before queueing up for any more PVP matches, otherwise you are putting yourself at risk of getting more penalties.

A good first place to start troubleshooting these black screens is with this handy [**FPS guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting). Go through each step there, making sure to update drivers and such along the way, and test those changes in a custom or practice game first to make sure you'll be able to load the match.
